title: UberSoldier [UNCENSORED]
description:
August 1942: At the height of World War II, with the outcome still very 
much in doubt, secret Nazi experiments are being conducted to search for a 
way to bring life back to the dead. A grisly discovery is made during 
testing: the shock people experience upon death endows their minds with 
powerful supernatural abilities. After countless attempts, the Nazis 
finally succeed at raising the first of a new, horrific breed of warrior: 
The Ubersoldier. 
You are Karl Stolz, an officer killed leading a Wehrmacht patrol against 
partisan forces. The process that has brought life back to your lifeless 
body has unlocked powers from within your once-dead mindðbut it does not 
take away the memories of what your Nazi masters have done to you, and you 
want revenge! 
Using up to 16 different authentic World War II weapons to complement your 
new powers, fight both human and supernatural opponents over twelve levels 
of action-packed, brutal play in your quest to eliminate the Nazi menace 
once and for all. Use your wrath and otherworldly powers to eliminate the 
forces of evil! 

Features: 

* HeadShot Driven Gameplay 
system which rewards bloody and brutal action 
* Sci-Fi Action Elements 
cinematic special effects like temporal shield and time whirling 
* Independent Physical Object Apparatus 
all objects have their own independent physical existence 
* Advanced Rag Doll Technology 
experience never before seen realism of human movements
